SKT_FIRST.name: Mikazuki 1st Art: Blooming
SKT_FIRST.true_desc:
Attacks an enemy.
Depending on the unique effect applied to the caster, activates one of the following effects:

Ume Ichirin: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> after attacking.

Sakura, Chiru: Attacks all enemies. Always attacks with <color=#28d9ed>elemental advantage</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 条件なしで\nすべての追加効果\n発動

description:
Attacks an enemy.
Depending on the unique effect applied to the caster, activates one of the following effects:

Ume Ichirin: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000065_1_1]</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000065_1_1]</color> after attacking.

Sakura, Chiru: Attacks all enemies. Always attacks with <color=#28d9ed>elemental advantage</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr:
적을 공격합니다.
보유한 고유 효과에 따라 이하의 효과 중 하나가 적용됩니다.

【우메이치린】 : 적을 공격합니다. 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color>의 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다.

【사쿠라치루】 : 적 전체를 공격합니다. 항상 <color=#28d9ed>유리한 상성</color>으로 적용됩니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp:
敵単体にダメージを与える。
自分に【梅一輪】または【桜散る】がある場合、次の効果が発動する。

【梅一輪】:敵単体にダメージを与える。<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。

 【桜散る】:敵全体 にダメージを与える。このスキルは敵の属性を無視し、<color=#28d9ed>有利属性</color>の攻撃判定でダメージを与える。

SKT_SECOND.name: Mikazuki 2nd Art: Pruning
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect)Increases <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> and increases damage dealt to bosses.\nWhen using <color=#28d9ed>Mikazuki Form 1: Bloom</color>, increases WG damage dealt to enemies by <color=#28d9ed>1</color>.
description: (Passive Effect) Increases <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000065_2_3]</color> and increases damage dealt against bosses.\nIncreases Weakness Gauge damage dealt to enemies when using <color=#28d9ed>Mikazuki 1st Art: Blooming</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000065_2_1]</color>.

2_jp: ボスモンスターに与えるダメージ+10%
3_jp: ボスモンスターに与えるダメージ+10%
4_jp: ボスモンスターに与えるダメージ+10%
5_jp: ボスモンスターに与えるダメージ+10%

SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (패시브 효과) <color=#28d9ed>치명 확률</color>이 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 증가하고, 보스에게 입히는 피해가 증가합니다.\n<color=#28d9ed>미카즈키 1식 : 개화</color> 사용 시 적에게 입히는 WG 피해가 <color=#28d9ed>1</color> 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)<color=#28d9ed>会心率</color>が<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>上昇し、ボスへの与ダメージが増加します。\n<color=#28d9ed>ミカヅキ壱式:開花</color>使用時、敵へのWGダメージが<color=#28d9ed>1</color>増加します。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Mikazuki 3rd Art: Flower Charm
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc:
Attacks an enemy, then grants an extra turn.

Before attacking, if the target's Health is less than or equal to <color=#28d9ed>90%</color>, grants the <color=#28d9ed>Ume Ichirin</color> effect for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> and increases damage dealt.

If the target's Health is greater than <color=#28d9ed>90%</color>, grants the <color=#28d9ed>Sakura, Chiru</color> effect for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> and generates <color=#28d9ed>5</color> <color=#28d9ed>Chain Points</color>.
description:
Attacks an enemy, then grants an extra turn.

Before attacking, if the target's Health is less than or equal to <color=#28d9ed>90%</color>, grants the <color=#28d9ed>Ume Ichirin</color> effect for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000065_3_1] turn(s)</color> and increases damage dealt.

If the target's Health is greater than <color=#28d9ed>90%</color>, grants the <color=#28d9ed>Sakura, Chiru</color> effect for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000065_3_2] turn(s)</color> and generates <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000065_3_4]</color> <color=#28d9ed>Chain Points</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr:
적을 공격 후 추가 턴을 획득합니다.

공격 전 대상의 현재 체력이 <color=#28d9ed>90%</color> 이하라면 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>우메이치린</color> 효과를 획득하고, 피해량이 증가합니다.

대상의 현재 체력이 <color=#28d9ed>90%</color>를 초과한다면 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>사쿠라치루</color> 효과를 획득하고, <color=#28d9ed>CP</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>5</color> 회복합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp:
敵単体にダメージを与え、追加ターンを獲得する。

攻撃前に対象の残りHPが<color=#28d9ed>90%</color>以下の場合、自分に<color=#28d9ed>【梅一輪】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与し、与えるダメージがUPする。

対象の残りHPが<color=#28d9ed>90%</color>を超える場合、自分に<color=#28d9ed>【桜散る】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与し、<color=#28d9ed>CP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>5</color>獲得する。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Generates <color=#28d9ed>25</color> Chain Points after attacking.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Generates <color=#28d9ed>15</color> Action Points for the caster.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Generates <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000065_chain_1_1]</color> Chain Points after attacking.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Generates <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000065_backup_1_1]</color> Action Points for the caster.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>25</color>의 CP를 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 자신의 AP를 <color=#28d9ed>15</color> 회복합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、CPを<color=#28d9ed>25</color>獲得する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:自分にAPを<color=#28d9ed>15</color>獲得させる。
